--- create_table_with_sequence_function.sql
CREATE TABLE foo
(
    foo INT64 DEFAULT (GET_NEXT_SEQUENCE_VALUE(SEQUENCE foo_sequence)),
    bar STRING( MAX),
    id  INT64
)PRIMARY KEY (id)

--- AST
&ast.CreateTable{
  Rparen: 143,
  Name:   &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 16,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 23,
        NameEnd: 26,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 27,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      DefaultSemantics: &ast.ColumnDefaultExpr{
        Default: 33,
        Rparen:  88,
        Expr:    &ast.CallExpr{
          Rparen: 87,
          Func:   &ast.Path{
            Idents: []*ast.Ident{
              &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 42,
                NameEnd: 65,
                Name:    "GET_NEXT_SEQUENCE_VALUE",
              },
            },
          },
          Args: []ast.Arg{
            &ast.SequenceArg{
              Sequence: 66,
              Expr:     &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 75,
                NameEnd: 87,
                Name:    "foo_sequence",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 95,
        NameEnd: 98,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
      Type: &ast.SizedSchemaType{
        NamePos: 99,
        Rparen:  110,
        Name:    "STRING",
        Max:     true,
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 117,
        NameEnd: 119,
        Name:    "id",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 121,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
  },
  PrimaryKeys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: -1,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 141,
        NameEnd: 143,
        Name:    "id",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE foo (
  foo INT64 DEFAULT (GET_NEXT_SEQUENCE_VALUE(SEQUENCE foo_sequence)),
  bar STRING(MAX),
  id INT64
) PRIMARY KEY (id)
